Name: Citibank IN
Application Description:
Citi Mobile app provides the joy of banking at your fingertips. It is a one-stop solution to manage your Citibank Accounts and Credit Cards on your phone. 
Just install the app and sign-in much faster and simpler with your fingerprint or User ID and Internet Password (IPIN). The app is now securely linked to your User ID. 
Smart Banking Features:
•	View your account balances, recent transactions and available credit limits 
•	Instantly transfer money, pay bills, recharge your wallet or mobile
•	Add new payees in a simple & secure manner to immediately transfer funds via IMPS or NEFT
•	Create your own ‘@Citi’ Virtual Payment Address & transfer/receive funds instantly via UPI without the need for any account number or IFSC
•	Register for Snapshot and view your account balances and credit card details without having to login every time
•	Invest in deposits or in a host of mutual fund options
•	Connect with your RM & SRM instantly through in-app chat, audio & video calls (available to select Citigold & Citi Priority customers)
•	Convert large purchases on your credit card into easy EMIs
•	Report your lost or stolen cards and get them reissued  
•	Upload documents for KYC refresh, PAN updation or other services
•	Receive the latest offers and communication on Citi products through in-app notifications
•	Locate the nearest Citibank ATM, branches and retailers offering Citibank Privileges
Bank on the go with Citi Mobile app. Get started now.
This app is dedicated and may only be used by Citibank India customers.
